main event: A witness observed bright lights in the sky on 1 September 1965 in Manistee, Michigan, that changed direction multiple times.
interesting points: The lights were visible for about five minutes and initially traveled in a northeasterly direction, they then reversed to a southwesterly direction and back again,The witness reported no sound during the sighting despite the bright lights,The witness attempted to capture the lights on camera but found only two frames of film remaining,There were other witnesses present, including family and friends,The local authorities were informed but stated there was nothing they could do.
witness description: A family and friends of the witness who were on the patio together.
